p: The strain IEC-4408 (YFV-4408; accession number: KY861728) belonging to the 1E lineage of YFV, was isolated from a Howler monkey in 2008 [ 10]. The strain was passaged four times on Ae. albopictus C6/36 cells. Viral stocks for mosquito infections were produced on C6/36 cells and stored at -80Â°C.
